DataListSpec.Name: MIMED Provider View Data List
DataListSpec.Description: A data list showing provider view records.
DataListSpec.Author: UM Dev

SPDataList.c:CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_UM_USP_DATALIST_PROVIDERVIEW ( @UMHSID uniqueidentifier, --@MSG NVARCHAR(100) = NULL OUTPUT, @CURRENTAPPUSERID uniqueidentifier ) as set nocount on;
select DISTINCT p.ID, c.ID as CONSTITUENTID, c.NAME as PROVIDERNAME, p.PROVIDERDRNUMBER, case when d.ID is NOT null then d.NAME else N'' end as DEPARTMENT, case when sd.ID is NOT null then sd.NAME else N'' end as SUBDEPARTMENT, p.ADMITDOCTORIND, p.ATTENDDOCTORIND, p.RESIDENTDOCTORIND, p.CONSULTDOCTORIND, dbo.USR_UFN_UM_FORMATPHONE(p.PHONE) as PHONE
from dbo.USR_UMHS_PROVIDERS p inner join USR_UMHS_VISITS v on v.providerid = p.ID inner join dbo.CONSTITUENT c on c.ID = p.CONSTITUENTID left join USR_UMHS_DATA u on u.ID = v.UMHSID --left outer join [STATE] s on s.ID = p.STATEID left outer join USR_UMHS_DEPARTMENT d on d.ID = p.DEPARTMENTID left outer join USR_UMHS_SUBDEPARTMENT sd on sd.ID = p.SUBDEPARTMENTID WHERE v.UMHSID = @UMHSID /* --Audit code start */ DECLARE @USERNAME VARCHAR(100) DECLARE @DISPLAYNAME VARCHAR(100) DECLARE @NAME VARCHAR(200) DECLARE @EVENTMESSAGE VARCHAR(1000) DECLARE @PID VARCHAR(100) DECLARE @PATIENTONLY BIT DECLARE @PATIENTSECURITY VARCHAR(100)
SELECT @USERNAME = USERNAME ,@DISPLAYNAME = DISPLAYNAME FROM APPUSER WHERE ID = @CURRENTAPPUSERID SELECT @NAME = NAME ,@PID = LOOKUPID FROM CONSTITUENT inner join USR_UMHS_DATA gp on gp.CONSTITUENTID = CONSTITUENT.ID WHERE gp.ID = @UMHSID
DECLARE @CHANGEAGENTID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER
IF @CHANGEAGENTID is null EXEC dbo.USP_CHANGEAGENT_GETORCREATECHANGEAGENT @CHANGEAGENTID output;
Declare @PAGEID uniqueidentifier ='88159265-2b7e-4c7b-82a2-119d01ecd40f' --Constituent Page Declare @TABID uniqueidentifier ='d797ffd4-d395-4574-8028-448cced5c31b' --MIMED Data Declare @SUBTABID uniqueidentifier ='3f47b8c0-4552-4b85-a8ef-ed4cf8733b46' --MIMED Provider subtab
--Insert in to log table for auditing purpose. INSERT INTO dbo.USR_UMHS_MIMEDTABVIEWLOG(APPUSERID,PAGEID, TABID, SUBTABID, CONTEXTRECORDID, ISPATIENTVIEW, ADDEDBYID, CHANGEDBYID,DATEADDED, DATECHANGED ) VALUES ( @CURRENTAPPUSERID,@PAGEID,@TABID,@SUBTABID, @UMHSID, 1, @CHANGEAGENTID , @CHANGEAGENTID, GETDATE(), GETDATE() )
--ADD TO EVENT VIEWER --commenting for now. -- SET @EVENTMESSAGE = 'Username: ' + @USERNAME + ' Displayname: ' + @DISPLAYNAME + ' viewed ' + @NAME + ' PID - ' + @PID + ' GP tab. This record is a ' + @PATIENTSECURITY -- EXEC master.dbo.xp_logevent 60000, @EVENTMESSAGE, informational
-- declare @Msg as varchar(100) --set @Msg = 'Your View of MIMED Info Data has been logged! ' /* --Audit code end */
